author: Megan Armstrong
title: Gregg Popovich Remains Committed to Coaching Team USA in 2021 Olympics
description: USA Basketball is approaching the Tokyo Olympics the same despite the Games officially being  postponed  from this summer to 2021 due to the global coronavirus pandemic on Tuesday morning...
content:
Jason Miller/Getty Images
USA Basketball is approaching the Tokyo Olympics the same despite the Games officially being postponed from this summer to 2021 due to the global coronavirus pandemic on Tuesday morning.
